Click me! Icon made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com About About TakeCare is a social Android app written in Java and developed on Android Studio, suitable for all audiences over the age of 13.\nIn the app, you choose the role of either a giver or a taker at any given time. A giver shares a thing that they own but are not interested in, whereas a taker can browse such things and choose one to schedule a pickup.\n\nAmong the things you can share with others (or express your interest in):\n\u2022 Food\n\u2022 Furniture\n\u2022 Study material\n\u2022 Hitchhikes\n\u2022 Lost & Founds\n\u2022 Just about anything you see fit!\n\nJoin the sharing revolution: help brighten someone\'s day, and also help the world by not excessively throwing away like in most modern families! Welcome to TakeCare! Let\'s have a quick tour over our amazing features! Here all available posts will be displayed.\nYou can tap on each post to reveal detailed information and contact the poster Here you can add your own post and share a cool item with everyone! Here you can switch to a map to view all posts with available location pinned on it Here you can filter the posts using different options.\nLet\'s check them out! Every post can be uploaded with custom keywords.\nHere you can filter them by those keywords. There are three pickup methods: In Person, Giveaway or Race (\"First come first claims\").\nYou can also choose to see all methods at once. Tapping here we can navigate through our app. Let\'s see what\'s inside! Here your profile picture and name are displayed. You can tap the picture and change them in your profile settings anytime. Here you can choose to see items of only a certain category\n You can also access your active chats through here, items you requested and items you shared, and your favorite keywords.\nFor every item posted with one of your favorite keywords, you will be notified immediately, so you won\'t miss it! You are welcome to explore our many options.\nHappy sharing! Next Done
